name: Snowmobile Simulator: VR Game for Google Cardboard
name_original: Snowmobile Simulator: VR Game for Google Cardboard
description:
Extreme Virtual Reality Snowmobile riding experience now available!

You won't regret trying this. This is not a tour - it's real game. The snowmobile will steer along with movement of Your body! No controller needed.

Stunning winter environment that will make You stop, to watch the views.
Everyone will find something for them in there. From extreme trials for those who want to feel some adrenaline to easy ones for those that want just relax and admire 360 breathtaking views.


Features:
* Stunning winter forest mountains environment to explore.
* Optimized for purpose of Virtual Reality


Play on Your favorite VR Headset.
____________
Health Warning.
When using application remain seated and stationary and stop using, when you experience discomfort or health reaction.
Ensure you read this document: http://wenklystudio.com/legal/Warnings/VrHealthWarning.pdf before first use.
____________
